about_the_game:
• 1. You can purchase and build factories, production lines, research and develop products, obtain loans, expand markets, and obtain ISO certification in the game. Through these operations, you can establish a basic business environment for your enterprise. Then, you can advertise, select orders, purchase raw materials, produce products, and submit orders to earn income, allowing you to continue expanding your business.



  • 2. AI competitors.In the game, there is AI competing with you in the market, with 21 difficulty levels. The AI with the highest difficulty level of "Advanced 20" will have a very strong budget ability, and without a certain level of strength, it will definitely not win.



  • 3. Financial system.In the game, there are accounting entries, balance sheets, income statements, cash flow statements, and DuPont analysis charts. Your actions will have a real-time impact on the financial system, and you will unconsciously learn financial statements during the game.



  • 4. Ranking system.Check your market ranking through the leaderboard to adjust your strategy accordingly.



  • 5. Random rule system.The rules of each game will randomly change, so the competition situation in each game will be different.



  • 6. Budget table system.There is an old saying in China that goes, 'If you plan ahead, you will succeed; if you don't plan ahead, you will fail.' You need to make an appropriate budget according to the rules of this bureau to ensure the smooth operation of your business.



  • 7. Achievement system.For every difficulty you successfully challenge, you will receive a trophy. When you complete all your achievements, you will receive 21 trophies, which is your honor.



  • 8. Historical system.Whether it's failure or success, you can gain experience and constantly improve by reviewing.
